title: Complain channels
title2: Please file your complaint via email
p:
When you met unfair investment, wrongdoing, unjust conduct in relation to the company and/or investors, the Audit Committee and/or the Board of Directors will examine complaints and clues from you to solve such problems for any investors and the company as soon as possible.

Please complete all information and this information will be sent to the Audit Committee and/or the Board of Directors appointed by the CEO. Moreover, your information will be kept confidential.
name: Name-Surname
subject: Complaint topic
